segments.text: I notice the little girl standing there, just waiting for her cookie like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so cute with her hand outstretched, hoping her brother will share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s too young to realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and the boy is reaching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t drop the plate he’s holding—it’ll shatter on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, just drying that same plate over and over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at the girl’s excitement, even if it’s a bad situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the mess or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing is like a silent movie scene—everything is about to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the kids because they’re going to get in trouble when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR
